DataStreamTemplate.name: DataStreamTemplate
DataStreamTemplate.description: Represents metadata about the data stream that a user adds to a data kit. This object is available in API version 52.0 and later.

DataSourceBundleDefinitionId.description: The ID of the DataSourceBundleDefinition, which refers to the data stream bundle to which a data stream template belongs. This field is a relationship field.

DataSourceObjectId.description: The ID of the DataSourceObject, which represents the object from where the data was sourced.This field is a relationship field.

DeveloperName.description: Unique name for the data stream template. Identical value to FullName.

FilterCriteria.description: Describes the filter applied to the data stream before the information is sent to Data 360.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated metadata object in Metadata API.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the state of an entity in a package.

MasterLabel.description: Indicates the name of the bundle.

Metadata.description: Describes additional information that's necessary for the data stream template.

NamespacePrefix.description: Namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix.

RefreshDayOfMonth.description: The duration of the day of the month after which the data stream template must be refreshed.

RefreshDayOfWeek.description: The duration of the day of the week after which the data stream must be refreshed.

RefreshFrequency.description: The frequency with which the data stream must be refreshed.

RefreshHours.description: The duration after which the data stream template must be refreshed.

RefreshStartDate.description: The date to retrieve data based on the refresh frequency data. Available in API version 62.0 and later.

SourceObjectName.description: The name of the source object from which data is streamed. Available in API version 62.0 and later.

StreamType.description: The type of data stream. Available in API version 62.0 and later.

StreamingAppDataConnectorType.description: The connector app for data streaming. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

TemplateVersion.description: The version number of the template. Available in API version 62.0 and later.
